release.action: Fixed EnzymeCommissionNumber.compare method in order to take into account preliminary EC numbers.
Added comparators for enzyme entries based on EC number and common name.
Added implementation for preliminary EC numbers.
Added MetaCyc as xref for enzymes (to their preliminary EC numbers).
Fixed XrefDatabaseConstant.BRENDA, now considered as xref (to their preliminary EC numbers).
Updated to latest rhea-domain and biobabel-core (updated validator with support for preliminary EC numbers).
Obsolete class DataComment is not used any longer.
Added enumerations to replace constant classes.
Added methods to use the new enumerations.
Fixed UniProt URL for their new website.
Updated to latest rhea.domain module to fix problems related to MetaCyc xrefs in reactions, reflecting in IntEnz curator tool.
Updated to last rhea.domain (for reaction Source class refactoring) and xchars-config (for ý character) versions.
Moved biopax code to its own module, as it is not mandatory for the curator application.
Changed old BRENDA URL with the new one (www.brenda-enzymes.info).
